title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the deduction of interest paid in certain situations where the debt is guaranteed by a related foreign person.
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the limitation for the deduction of interest for interest payments on debt guaranteed by a foreign person as long as the taxpayer establishes that it could have borrowed the same amount of debt from an unrelated lender without a guarantee. Revises the definition of disqualified interest.
